tags.name: Card Battle
tags.description: Centers around individuals competing in card games.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Criminal Organization
tags.description: Prominently features a group of people who commit crimes for illicit or violent purposes.

tags.name: Orphan
tags.description: Prominently features a character that is an orphan.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Memory Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

tags.name: Police
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of law enforcement officers.

tags.name: Butler
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a butler.

tags.name: Cars
tags.description: Centers around the use of automotive vehicles.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Crime
tags.description: Centers around unlawful activities punishable by the state or other authority.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Assassins
tags.description: Centers around characters who murder people as a profession.

tags.name: Disability
tags.description: A work that features one or more characters with a physical, mental, cognitive, or developmental condition that impairs, interferes with, or limits the person's ability to engage in certain tasks or actions.

tags.name: Werewolf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a werewolf.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/poipheno) | [Website (Kawamoto Muno Studio)](https://kawamuno.com/)

Together with [Homura Kawamoto](https://anilist.co/staff/119000/Homura-Kawamoto) they make up the studio Kawamoto Muno Studio.

[Personal Website](http://2st.jp/500/) | [Website (Kawamoto Muno Studio)](https://kawamuno.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ushimilksan) Homura Kawamoto is a Japanese manga artist. Together with [Hikaru Muno](https://anilist.co/staff/128746/) they make up the studio Kawamoto Muno Studio.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hayama11)

Married to [Atsuko Ueno](https://anilist.co/staff/216671/).

Older brother of [Kenji Hayama](https://anilist.co/staff/105419/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hayama11)

Married to [Atsuko Ueno](https://anilist.co/staff/216671/).

Older brother of [Kenji Hayama](https://anilist.co/staff/105419/).
Veteran animator specialized in effects animation.
Veteran animator specialized in effects animation.
**Minoru Oonishi** is a Japanese art director and art designer.

__[Profile (Lantis)](https://www.lantis.jp/artist/Void_Chords/bio.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RyoTakahashi111)__

__Ryo Takashi__, alternatively known as Void_Chords, is a Japanese composer, arranger, music producer, bassist and DJ. He also works with the doujin group FELT under the alias Maurits "ZEN" Cornelis.
Founder and representative director of Otonarium.
Shouji Hata is an Audio Engineer.
